description: Bridges: Method `addErrorMessage()` must have `public function create<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CollectionRequestTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionResponseTransfer;` signature.

Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `addErrorMessage()`. Missed return type. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"
Bridges: Type should be defined for param `permissionKey` in method `Spryker\Zed\CartPermissionConnector\Dependency\Facade\CartPermissionConnectorToPermissionFacadeBridge::can()`.
